TeamMentor page for: Connection String Injection

Content for CWE ID: 99

Checkmarx Rule

QueryId : 286
Cwe : 99

Severity : 3

Status : Original
Type : Regular

Source

 CxList con = 	Find_Methods().FindByShortName("SQLConnect") + 
				Find_Methods().FindByMemberAccess("Connection.open") +
				Find_Methods().FindByMemberAccess("Connection.connect");

CxList inputs = Find_Interactive_Inputs();

result = con.DataInfluencedBy(inputs);
